item.title: Built with UE5, Borderlands 4 delivers ambitious scale with World Partition, Nanite, Lumen, and more
item.description: üöÄ Exciting advancements are coming to the Borderlands series with Borderlands 4! Gearbox Software highlights how Unreal Engine 5 features like World Partition and Nanite enhance gameplay. These technologies allow for larger, more detailed environments, improving player experience. Stay tuned for more updates on this ambitious installment! üéÆ‚ú® #Borderlands4 #GameDevelopment #UE5 #GearboxSoftware #GamingNews

item.title: Fan-Made PREDATOR Cinematic: IT ALL ENDS | Unreal Engine 5.6 | MetaHuman
item.description: üé¨ Exciting news for fans of the Predator franchise! A talented group has released a fan-made cinematic titled “PREDATOR: IT ALL ENDS,” crafted entirely using Unreal Engine 5.6. This project showcases impressive visuals and storytelling. The creators shared insights about the production process, revealing they completed a total of 108 shots. Check it out and immerse yourself in this indie creation! #Predator #FanFilm #UnrealEngine #Cinematic #IndieFilm

item.title: Siili Auto: creating a great HMI experience with Unreal Engine
item.description: Siili Auto has selected Unreal Engine as their primary tool for designing, developing, and testing Human-Machine Interfaces (HMI). This choice is driven by Unreal Engine’s impressive visuals and efficiency. Additionally, it allows Siili Auto to craft unique, branded experiences for the automotive industry. üöó‚ú®üîß #SiiliAuto #UnrealEngine #HMI #AutomotiveTech #Innovation

item.title: MetaHuman for Houdini Release
item.description: üöÄ Exciting news for creators! A new version of MetaHuman for Houdini is now available for download from Fab. This update allows users to bring MetaHuman characters to life in SideFX Houdini. This release enhances the integration between Unreal Engine and Houdini, streamlining workflows for developers. #MetaHuman #Houdini #GameDevelopment #3DArt #UnrealEngine

item.title: The future of Riot‚Äôs VALORANT is built on UE5
item.description: Riot Games is upgrading VALORANT from Unreal Engine 4 to Unreal Engine 5. Marcus Reid explains that this shift aims to enhance gameplay and graphics, ensuring the game remains competitive and appealing. The transition is part of Riot’s strategy to secure VALORANT’s future in the gaming landscape. üéÆ‚ú® #VALORANT #RiotGames #GamingNews #UE5 #GameDevelopment

item.title: Forest in a (Water) Bottle | Virtual Aquarium

This project highlights the innovative possibilities for developers in creating immersive environments. #UnrealEngine5 #GameDevelopment #VirtualReality #Innovation

item.title: MONGIL: STAR DIVE brings monster collection and solo party play to PC, console, and mobile
item.description: üöÄ Exciting news in the gaming world! Netmarble Monster’s CEO, Ken Kim, recently shared insights about their new game, MONGIL: STAR DIVE. This cross-platform collectible action-adventure game is set to launch on PC, console, and mobile, developed using Unreal Engine 5. Stay tuned for more updates on this innovative gaming experience! üéÆ‚ú® #MONGIL #StarDive #GamingNews #Netmarble #ActionAdventure

item.title: UE5 Automotive Cinematic
item.description: üöó‚ú® Unreal Engine 5 (UE5) showcases its potential in automotive cinematics. The article dives into the technical aspects and features that make UE5 a powerful tool for creating stunning visuals in the automotive industry. It highlights how real-time rendering and advanced lighting techniques enhance vehicle presentations. The use of UE5 allows for greater creativity and efficiency in producing automotive content. #UnrealEngine5 #AutomotiveCinematics #3DRendering #GameDevelopment #Innovation

item.title: Register now for the Mega Stack-O-Jam game jam
item.description: üéÆ Join the Mega Stack-O-Jam starting August 14! This week-long game jam invites participants to explore level design using the new Stack-O-Bot sample. item.title: Updated Stack-O-Bot for Unreal Engine 5.6‚Äîavailable now

Whether you’re new to UE or seeking a strong base for your project, Stack-O-Bot offers valuable resources to boost your game development skills. #UnrealEngine #GameDevelopment #StackOBot #GameDesign #UE5

item.title: Cory Williams makes hit children‚Äôs YouTube channel featuring Silly Crocodile

item.title: The Trials 2 ‚Äì A New First-Person Puzzle Game
item.description: üåü Introducing “The Trials 2”! Ahmad Sultan, an independent game developer from Syria, has launched a new first-person puzzle game. The Trials 2 draws inspiration from well-known titles like The Talos Principle. Get ready to solve intricate puzzles and experience a unique gaming journey! #TheTrials2 #GameDevelopment #IndieGame #PuzzleGame #GamingCommunity

item.title: MetaHuman for Maya Release
item.description: üöÄ Exciting news for creators! The latest version of MetaHuman for Maya has been launched, featuring the new Pose Editor. This tool allows rigging artists to assemble and customize MetaHuman characters directly in Autodesk Maya. Explore the enhanced capabilities and improve your character creation process! #MetaHuman #Maya #3DAnimation #CharacterDesign #GameDev

item.title: Made with UE5, Wildgate blends emergent gameplay with explosive spaceship combat
item.description: üöÄ Exciting developments in gaming! Moonshot Games is using Unreal Engine 5 features like Nanite, Lumen, and Chaos in their debut project, the PvP space shooter Wildgate. These technologies enhance graphics and gameplay. Discover how these tools are shaping the future of gaming. #Wildgate #MoonshotGames #UE5 #GamingNews #SpaceShooter

item.title: July‚Äôs free learning content: non-human digital characters, motion capture, and more
item.description: üöÄ Dive into July’s free learning content! Explore how to create non-human characters with MetaHuman, simulate realistic muscles using Chaos Flesh, and design procedural urban environments in Unreal Engine. These resources offer valuable insights for anyone looking to enhance their skills in digital character creation and animation! #GameDevelopment #UnrealEngine #MetaHuman #DigitalArt #LearningResources
